title: Maybe Silent Hill Should Just Stay Dead | Extra Punctuation
description:
This week on Extra Punctuation, Yahtzee looks at the Silent Hill franchise and whether people should just move on from a franchise that is no longer made by the same people that made it what it was in the first place.

title: State of Play Showcase with The Escapist
description:
Our coverage of Summer Game Fest begins today with Sony's State of Play showcase. Hosted by Marty, KC and JM8, the pre-show begins at 4:30 PM CT, with the showcase starting at 5PM CT and the post-show to follow at 5:30 PM CT.

Pre-show - 4:30 PM CT
Main show - 5:00 PM CT
Post-show - 5:30 PM CT
